mapper.select: SELECT P.PCODE, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.INPUT_DATE, P.LOC, P.IMG, B.BUYRECEIPTCODE, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE) / (30 * 12))) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE) / 30)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE))) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE) * 24)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE) * 24 * 60)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - P.INPUT_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60)) DATE_GAP FROM PRODUCT P, MEMBER M, BUYRECEIPT B WHERE M.ID=#{id} AND P.ID=M.ID AND PCANCEL='N' AND P.PCODE=B.PCODE(+)

SELECT PCODE, PNAME, PRICE, INPUT_DATE, LOC, IMG, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE) / (30 * 12))) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE) / 30)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE))) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE) * 24)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE) * 24 * 60)) DATE_GAP, TO_CHAR(CEIL((SYSDATE - INPUT_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60)) DATE_GAP FROM (SELECT P.ID, P.PCODE, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.INPUT_DATE, P.LOC, P.IMG FROM PRODUCT P WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM BUYRECEIPT B WHERE P.PCODE=B.PCODE) ) WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT P.PCODE, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.INPUT_DATE, P.LOC, P.IMG FROM PRODUCT P, BUYRECEIPT B, MEMBER M WHERE M.ID=#{id} AND P.ID=M.ID AND P.PCODE=B.PCODE AND CANCLE IS NULL
